Name: Kohl Pot Shaped Like Two Monkeys
Description: Pots and jars for kohl, an eye paint used to enhance beauty and protect the eyes, were generally made with considerable creativity. This kohl pot is in the form of two pet monkeys squatting on their hind legs, opposite each other on an oblong base. They are holding the kohl pot between their hands. The pot has a wide lip and bulging belly. There are signs of erasure on the surface.
